verses.text: \w After|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w*, \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w had|strong="G2424"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w scourged|strong="G3146"\w*.

\w The|strong="G2532"\w* \w soldiers|strong="G4757"\w* made \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w crown|strong="G4735"\w* \w with|strong="G1537"\w* \w some|strong="G3588"\w* thorns \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w put|strong="G2007"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w on|strong="G1537"\w* \w his|strong="G2007"\w* \w head|strong="G2776"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* threw \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w purple|strong="G4210"\w* \w robe|strong="G2440"\w* \w round|strong="G2532"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*.

\w They|strong="G2532"\w* \w kept|strong="G2532"\w* \w coming|strong="G2064"\w* \w up|strong="G1325"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, ‘Long \w live|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w king|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*!’ \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* blow \w after|strong="G2532"\w* blow \w with|strong="G4314"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w hands|strong="G4475"\w*.

\w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* \w came|strong="G1831"\w* \w outside|strong="G1854"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w people|strong="G3004"\w*, ‘\w Look|strong="G3708"\w*! \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w am|strong="G2532"\w* bringing \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w so|strong="G2443"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* \w know|strong="G1097"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w find|strong="G2147"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3756"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w can|strong="G3004"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* charged.’

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w came|strong="G1831"\w* \w outside|strong="G1854"\w*, \w wearing|strong="G5409"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w crown|strong="G4735"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* thorns \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w purple|strong="G4210"\w* \w robe|strong="G2440"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G3004"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*, ‘\w Here|strong="G2400"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* man!’

\w When|strong="G3753"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w chief|strong="G2532"\w* priests \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* guards \w saw|strong="G3708"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*, \w they|strong="G2532"\w* shouted, ‘\w Crucify|strong="G4717"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*! \w Crucify|strong="G4717"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*!’ ‘\w Take|strong="G2983"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w yourselves|strong="G4771"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w crucify|strong="G4717"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*,’ \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w*. ‘\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w my|strong="G3708"\w* \w part|strong="G1473"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w find|strong="G2147"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3756"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w can|strong="G3004"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* charged.’

‘\w But|strong="G2532"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w*,’ replied \w the|strong="G2532"\w* crowd, ‘\w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w a|strong="G2192"\w* \w Law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w under|strong="G2192"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w deserves|strong="G2192"\w* death \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w making|strong="G4160"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w out|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.’

\w When|strong="G3753"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* heard \w what|strong="G3588"\w* \w they|strong="G3588"\w* \w said|strong="G3767"\w*, \w he|strong="G3778"\w* \w became|strong="G3588"\w* \w still|strong="G3123"\w* \w more|strong="G3123"\w* alarmed;

\w and|strong="G2532"\w*, \w going|strong="G2532"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* Government house \w again|strong="G3825"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, ‘\w Where|strong="G4159"\w* \w do|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w come|strong="G1525"\w* \w from|strong="G2532"\w*?’

\w But|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G3004"\w* \w made|strong="G3756"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w reply|strong="G3004"\w*. \w So|strong="G3767"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*, ‘\w Do|strong="G1492"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w refuse|strong="G3756"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w*? Don’\w t|strong="G3588"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w power|strong="G1849"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* release \w you|strong="G4771"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w power|strong="G1849"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w crucify|strong="G4717"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w*?’

\wj ‘\+w You|strong="G4771"\+w* \+w would|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w have|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w no|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w power|strong="G1849"\+w* \+w over|strong="G3860"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1325"\+w* \+w at|strong="G2596"\+w* \+w all|strong="G2596"\+w*,’\wj* answered \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \wj ‘\+w if|strong="G1487"\+w* \+w it|strong="G1487"\+w* \+w had|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w been|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w given|strong="G1325"\+w* \+w you|strong="G4771"\+w* \+w from|strong="G2596"\+w* above; \+w and|strong="G2424"\+w*, \+w therefore|strong="G1223"\+w*, \+w the|strong="G1223"\+w* \+w man|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w who|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w betrayed|strong="G3860"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1325"\+w* \+w to|strong="G2596"\+w* \+w you|strong="G4771"\+w* \+w is|strong="G1510"\+w* guilty \+w of|strong="G1223"\+w* \+w the|strong="G1223"\+w* \+w greater|strong="G3173"\+w* sin.’\wj*

\w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w made|strong="G4160"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* anxious \w to|strong="G3004"\w* release \w him|strong="G3588"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* crowd shouted, ‘\w If|strong="G1437"\w* \w you|strong="G1437"\w* release \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w man|strong="G3778"\w*, \w you|strong="G1437"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w friend|strong="G5384"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* Emperor! \w Anyone|strong="G3956"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w makes|strong="G4160"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w out|strong="G1537"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* \w king|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w setting|strong="G4160"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w against|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* Emperor!’

\w On|strong="G1909"\w* hearing \w what|strong="G3588"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w brought|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w out|strong="G1854"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w took|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G1519"\w* \w seat|strong="G2523"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* Bench \w at|strong="G1909"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w place|strong="G5117"\w* \w called|strong="G3004"\w* “\w The|strong="G2532"\w* Stone \w Pavement|strong="G3038"\w*” – \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w Hebrew|strong="G1447"\w* “\w Gabbatha|strong="G1042"\w*.”

\w It|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Passover|strong="G3957"\w* \w Preparation|strong="G3904"\w* \w day|strong="G3904"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w about|strong="G5613"\w* \w noon|strong="G5610"\w*. \w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* crowd, ‘\w Here|strong="G1510"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w king|strong="G3588"\w*!’

\w At|strong="G3756"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w people|strong="G3767"\w* shouted, ‘Kill \w him|strong="G3588"\w*! Kill \w him|strong="G3588"\w*! \w Crucify|strong="G4717"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*!’ ‘\w What|strong="G3588"\w*! \w Should|strong="G3588"\w* \w I|strong="G1487"\w* \w crucify|strong="G4717"\w* \w your|strong="G2192"\w* \w king|strong="G3588"\w*?’ \w exclaimed|strong="G3004"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w*. ‘\w We|strong="G1487"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w king|strong="G3588"\w* \w but|strong="G1487"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* Emperor,’ \w replied|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* chief priests;

\w so|strong="G2443"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G3860"\w* \w gave|strong="G3860"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w up|strong="G3860"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w be|strong="G2443"\w* \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w*. \w So|strong="G2443"\w* \w they|strong="G3588"\w* \w took|strong="G3880"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*;

\w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w went|strong="G1831"\w* \w out|strong="G1831"\w*, carrying \w his|strong="G1438"\w* \w cross|strong="G4716"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w*, \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w place|strong="G5117"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w named|strong="G3004"\w* \w from|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w skull|strong="G2898"\w*, \w or|strong="G2532"\w*, \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w Hebrew|strong="G1447"\w*, \w Golgotha|strong="G1115"\w*.

\w There|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w others|strong="G3588"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* – \w one|strong="G3588"\w* \w on|strong="G1161"\w* \w each|strong="G3326"\w* \w side|strong="G1782"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w between|strong="G3319"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*.

\w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G2424"\w* \w these|strong="G3588"\w* \w words|strong="G2532"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w put|strong="G5087"\w* \w up|strong="G2532"\w* \w over|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w cross|strong="G4716"\w* – “\w JESUS|strong="G2424"\w* \w OF|strong="G2532"\w* \w NAZARETH|strong="G3480"\w*, \w THE|strong="G2532"\w* \w KING|strong="G3588"\w* \w OF|strong="G2532"\w* \w THE|strong="G2532"\w* \w JEWS|strong="G2453"\w*.”

\w These|strong="G3778"\w* \w words|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w read|strong="G1125"\w* \w by|strong="G2532"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w people|strong="G1510"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w place|strong="G5117"\w* \w where|strong="G3699"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w near|strong="G1451"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w Hebrew|strong="G1447"\w*, \w Latin|strong="G4515"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Greek|strong="G1676"\w*.

\w The|strong="G3588"\w* chief priests \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w*, ‘\w Do|strong="G3004"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w write|strong="G1125"\w* “\w The|strong="G3588"\w* \w king|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*”, \w but|strong="G3361"\w* \w write|strong="G1125"\w* \w what|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w man|strong="G3361"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* – “\w I|strong="G3754"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w king|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*.”’

\w But|strong="G3588"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* answered, ‘\w What|strong="G3739"\w* \w I|strong="G3739"\w* \w have|strong="G3588"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w*, \w I|strong="G3739"\w* \w have|strong="G3588"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w*.’

\w When|strong="G3753"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w soldiers|strong="G4757"\w* \w had|strong="G2424"\w* \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w took|strong="G2983"\w* \w his|strong="G1223"\w* \w clothes|strong="G2440"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* divided \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w into|strong="G2424"\w* \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \w shares|strong="G3313"\w* – \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w share|strong="G3313"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w each|strong="G1538"\w* \w soldier|strong="G4757"\w* – \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w took|strong="G2983"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w coat|strong="G2440"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*. \w The|strong="G2532"\w* \w coat|strong="G2440"\w* \w had|strong="G2424"\w* \w no|strong="G2532"\w* seam, \w being|strong="G1510"\w* \w woven|strong="G5307"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w one|strong="G1538"\w* \w piece|strong="G3313"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* top \w to|strong="G2532"\w* bottom.

\w So|strong="G2443"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w one|strong="G1438"\w* \w another|strong="G1438"\w*, ‘\w Do|strong="G4160"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w let|strong="G1510"\w* \w us|strong="G3004"\w* \w tear|strong="G4977"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w*, \w but|strong="G2532"\w* \w let|strong="G1510"\w* \w us|strong="G3004"\w* \w cast|strong="G2532"\w* \w lots|strong="G2819"\w* \w for|strong="G4012"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w*, \w to|strong="G4314"\w* see \w who|strong="G5101"\w* \w will|strong="G5101"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w*.’ \w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* fulfilment \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w words|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w scripture|strong="G1124"\w* – “\w They|strong="G2532"\w* shared \w my|strong="G1473"\w* \w clothes|strong="G2440"\w* \w among|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w over|strong="G1909"\w* \w my|strong="G1473"\w* \w clothing|strong="G2440"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w cast|strong="G2532"\w* \w lots|strong="G2819"\w*.” \w That|strong="G2443"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w soldiers|strong="G4757"\w* \w did|strong="G4160"\w*.

\w Meanwhile|strong="G1161"\w* near \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w cross|strong="G4716"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w standing|strong="G2476"\w* \w his|strong="G2532"\w* \w mother|strong="G3384"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G2532"\w* \w mother|strong="G3384"\w*’s sister, \w as|strong="G1161"\w* \w well|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G1161"\w* \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* wife \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w Clopas|strong="G2832"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* Magdala.

\w When|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w saw|strong="G3708"\w* \w his|strong="G3708"\w* \w mother|strong="G3384"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w disciple|strong="G3101"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* loved, \w standing|strong="G3936"\w* near, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G3708"\w* \w mother|strong="G3384"\w*, \wj ‘\+w There|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w is|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w your|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w son|strong="G5207"\+w*.’\wj*
